how_it_works.title: Rust+ Detects
how_it_works.description: Rust+ detects the raid and sends the alert.
how_it_works.subtitle: We Take Control

preview.title: Live Tracking
preview.description: Real-time status updates for your enemies.

pine.description: Premium Rust hosting. Industry-leading performance with custom control panel designed for serious server owners.

hosthavoc.description: Enterprise hardware with 99.9% uptime. 24/7 support with <10min response times. The reliable choice for modded servers.

gportal.description: Official host for Rust servers. Instant setup, DDoS protection included, and switch between games anytime. Great for beginners.

step1.title: Install Rust+
step1.description: Raid Alarm works together with Rust+.

hero.raid_alarm: Raid Alarm makes sure you hear it.

status.not_found: Rust+ app not found. Please install first.
status.already_installed: If Rust+ is already installed, you can continue.

step2.title: Connect Rust+
step2.subtitle: Link your server to receive events

items.1: Open Rust+ and log in with your Steam account
items.2: Join a server -> ESC Menu -> Pair with App
items.3: Ensure your server shows as 'Connected' in the app
items.4: Place 'Smart Alarms' in-game to receive alerts

step3.title: Enable Notifications
step3.description: Make sure raid alerts can actually reach your phone.

step4.description: Rust+ does send notifications ‚Äî but when:

reasons.silent: Your phone is on silent or vibrate

step4.boom: You never hear the first boom.
step4.fail_reason: Most offline raids succeed because alerts go unnoticed.

step5.title: Raid Alarm Upgrades
step5.subtitle: Converting Rust+ notifications into loud alarms
step5.notice:
So when Rust+ sends a notification ‚Äî
you're sure to notice it.

step6.title: Prepare Raid Alarm
step6.description: To make sure you never miss a raid, Raid Alarm needs a few permissions to work properly.
step6.warning: Without these, alerts may still be missed.

step7.title: Grant Permissions
step7.description: Click the options in order to grant permissions.

notification_access.title: Notification Access
notification_access.desc: To detect raid alerts from Rust+

battery_optimization.title: Ignore battery optimizations
battery_optimization.desc: To prevent alerts from being killed

overlay.title: Display over other apps
overlay.desc: To show alerts over any application

exact_alarms.title: Exact Alarms
exact_alarms.desc: To trigger alerts at precise times

autostart.title: Auto Start
autostart.desc: To ensure Raid Alarm starts with your phone

full_screen_intent.title: Full Screen Intent
full_screen_intent.desc: To show the alarm screen while the phone is locked

step8.title: YOU'RE READY
step8.description: Raid Alarm is now active in the background.
step8.subtitle: We'll wake you up if a raid is detected.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.contact_email:
For privacy-related questions, data requests, or to exercise your rights:

Email: alcstackdev@gmail.com
privacy_policy.section1_content: Raid Alarm collects only the minimum data necessary for the app to function: anonymized device ID for license validation, specific attack notifications from Rust+ application, lifetime license status (processed through Google Play Billing), and app settings stored locally on your device. We do not collect personal names, email addresses, phone numbers, location data, biometric data, or payment card information.
privacy_policy.section2_content:
We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:

‚Ä¢ Contract Performance: Processing necessary to provide the app services you requested
‚Ä¢ Legitimate Interests: Processing for app functionality and improvement
‚Ä¢ Consent: Where explicitly required, we obtain your consent before processing
privacy_policy.section3_content: We only process specific attack notifications from the Rust+ application. Notification data is processed entirely on your device and stored locally. We do not access notifications from any other applications. We use Android's standard NotificationListenerService API with your explicit consent. We have no affiliation with Rust+ application, Facepunch Studios Limited, or any related entities.
privacy_policy.section4_content: Raid Alarm requests only the minimum permissions necessary: notification access to monitor notifications from Rust+ application, battery optimization exemption for background operation, and alarm permission for alarm triggering.
privacy_policy.section5_content: Collected data is used only for running the alarm system, license validation, and app improvements. For Free Tier users, anonymized data may be used by Google AdMob to provide core advertising services. We do not sell or share your personal data with third-party marketers for their own purposes. We do not use automated decision-making or profiling beyond standard advertising features.
privacy_policy.section6_content: All notification data, settings, and statistics are stored locally on your device. Only purchase information is stored in an encrypted secure database. Notification data is never transmitted to our servers. Notification history is stored locally until you delete it or uninstall the app. License information is retained indefinitely to validate your lifetime purchase. You can delete all local data by uninstalling the app or request deletion of purchase data by contacting us.
privacy_policy.section7_content: We do not sell your personal data. Data sharing is limited to Google Play Store for payment processing, Google AdMob for serving advertisements to Free Tier users, and secure third-party services for license validation. We do not share your notification data with any third party. Users have the right to opt-out of data sale (we do not sell data) and manage ad preferences via device settings.
privacy_policy.section8_content: Purchase data may be processed in servers located in secure data centers. All international transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and appropriate safeguards. Data is encrypted during transfer using industry-standard encryption.
privacy_policy.section9_content: We implement technical and administrative security measures to protect your data, including local encryption, secure communication protocols, encrypted database storage, and limited access controls. However, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your data, we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy_policy.section10_content: You have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict processing, data portability, object to processing, and withdraw consent regarding your personal data. You have the right to know, delete, opt-out of sale (we do not sell data), and non-discrimination. To exercise your rights, contact us at the email address provided below. We will respond within a reasonable time frame as required by applicable law.
privacy_policy.section11_content: Our app is not intended for children under the age of 18 (or 13 in some jurisdictions). We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If we discover we have collected data from a child, we will delete it immediately. We are not responsible for, and accept no liability for, any purchases made by individuals under the age of 18 (or the age of majority in their jurisdiction). Parents or guardians are solely responsible for monitoring their children's use of the app and any purchases made. If a minor makes a purchase without proper authorization, the parent or guardian must contact Google Play Store for refund requests, as we do not process refunds.
privacy_policy.section12_content: In the event of a data breach that may affect your rights, we will notify relevant supervisory authorities as required by applicable law, and notify affected users without undue delay if there is a high risk to their rights.
privacy_policy.section13_content: This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. Significant changes will be notified to users. Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance. The last update date is shown at the top of this page.
privacy_policy.section14_content: The Free Tier of Raid Alarm is supported by advertising. We use Google AdMob to serve ads. AdMob may collect and use data such as your device's advertising ID to show relevant ads and for analytics purposes. Users who purchase a Lifetime License will have all third-party advertisements removed from the application.

terms_of_service.title: Terms of Service
terms_of_service.section1_content: By downloading, installing, accessing, or using Raid Alarm, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, do not use the App. You must be at least 18 years old (or the age of majority in your jurisdiction) to use this app. If you are under 18, you may only use this app with parental or guardian consent.
terms_of_service.section2_content: Raid Alarm is a mobile application available exclusively on Google Play Store that monitors notifications from the Rust+ application and triggers alarms when attack notifications are received. The App is provided "as is" without any warranties. The App's functionality is entirely dependent on the Rust+ application. If Rust+ is not installed, disabled, removed from Google Play Store, stops sending notifications, experiences delays, or if Rust game servers experience issues, the App will not function and we are not responsible for any resulting issues.
terms_of_service.section3_content: Raid Alarm has no affiliation, relationship, partnership, connection, endorsement, or sponsorship with Rust game, Rust+ application, Facepunch Studios Limited, or any related entities. Raid Alarm is an independent application. We use references to "Rust+", "Rust", "Facepunch", and related terms ONLY for identification and descriptive purposes to explain what the App does (nominative fair use under trademark law). We do not claim any rights to these trademarks. We are not authorized by, endorsed by, or connected to Facepunch Studios Limited in any way. If Facepunch Studios Limited objects to our use of these terms, we will comply with their requests immediately. Any use of these terms is purely descriptive and does not imply any relationship, authorization, or endorsement.
terms_of_service.section4_content:
CRITICAL DEPENDENCY NOTICE: Raid Alarm's functionality is COMPLETELY AND ABSOLUTELY DEPENDENT on the Rust+ application. The App will NOT FUNCTION under any of the following circumstances:

- Rust+ application is not installed on your device
- Rust+ application is disabled or uninstalled
- Rust+ application is removed from Google Play Store
- Rust+ application becomes unavailable or stops functioning
- Rust+ application stops sending notifications or notifications are delayed
- Rust+ application's "Smart Alarm" or notification features are removed, disabled, or modified
- Rust game servers experience issues, outages, or problems
- Facepunch Studios Limited restricts, limits, or prohibits notification functionality
- Internet connection issues prevent Rust+ notifications from being received
- Any other issue affecting Rust+ application's ability to send notifications

BY USING THE APP, YOU EXPLICITLY ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT:

- The App's functionality depends ENTIRELY on external services (Rust+ application and Rust game servers) over which we have ZERO CONTROL
- We are NOT RESPONSIBLE for Rust+ application availability, functionality, removal from Google Play Store, notification delays, or any changes made by Facepunch Studios Limited
- We are NOT RESPONSIBLE for Rust game server issues, outages, or problems
- We are NOT RESPONSIBLE if Facepunch Studios Limited restricts, limits, prohibits, or modifies Rust+ application's notification functionality
- You will NOT hold us responsible, request refunds, or make any claims against us due to Rust+ application issues, Rust game server issues, notification delays, or any other external dependency issues
- You understand that if Rust+ application is removed from Google Play Store or stops functioning, the App will immediately cease to function and you will have NO RIGHT to refunds, compensation, or any other remedies
terms_of_service.section5_content:
We are NOT RESPONSIBLE for, and ACCEPT NO LIABILITY for, any issues, problems, damages, losses, or consequences arising from:

- Rust game, Rust+ application, Facepunch Studios Limited, or any related entities
- Rust+ application being removed from Google Play Store
- Rust+ application stopping to send notifications or notifications being delayed
- Rust+ application's "Smart Alarm" or notification features being removed, disabled, or modified
- Rust game server issues, outages, or problems
- Any changes, restrictions, or modifications made by Facepunch Studios Limited
- Any other third-party services, applications, or dependencies

You use the App AT YOUR OWN RISK regarding all external dependencies. We have NO CONTROL over Rust+ application, Rust game servers, or Facepunch Studios Limited, and we are NOT RESPONSIBLE for any issues arising from these external dependencies.
terms_of_service.section6_content:
We guarantee that Raid Alarm will function correctly ONLY when ALL of the following conditions are met simultaneously:

- Rust game servers are operational and functioning normally
- Rust+ application is installed, enabled, and functioning normally on your device
- Rust+ application is available on Google Play Store and has not been removed
- Rust+ application is sending notifications without delays
- Rust+ application's notification features (including "Smart Alarm" if applicable) are active and not disabled
- Your device meets all technical requirements
- All required permissions are granted and maintained
- You have an active internet connection
- Facepunch Studios Limited has not restricted, limited, or prohibited notification functionality

If ANY of these conditions are not met, we CANNOT and DO NOT guarantee the App will function, and we are NOT RESPONSIBLE for any resulting issues, losses, or damages.
terms_of_service.section7_content: Raid Alarm requests only the minimum permissions necessary: notification access to monitor notifications from Rust+ application, battery optimization exemption for background operation, and alarm permission for alarm triggering.
terms_of_service.section8_content:
Availability: This App is available exclusively on Google Play Store. All purchases are processed through Google Play Store's billing system.

Subscription Options: Premium features are available through subscription plans (weekly, monthly, 3-month) or a one-time Lifetime License purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless cancelled before the renewal date.

Lifetime License: We offer a 'Lifetime License' which grants you permanent access to all premium features with NO recurring fees. This is a one-time payment.

Age Requirement: You must be at least 18 years old (or the age of majority in your jurisdiction) to purchase. If you are under 18, you may only purchase with parental or guardian consent. We are NOT RESPONSIBLE for any purchases made by minors without proper authorization. Parents or guardians are solely responsible for monitoring their children's purchases. If a minor makes a purchase without authorization, contact Google Play Store for refund requests.

Payment Processing: All payments are processed securely through Google Play Store. We do not store or have access to your payment card information. Payment information is handled entirely by Google Play Store.

Pricing: Prices may vary by country and are subject to change with advance notice. Current prices are displayed in the App and on Google Play Store.

Service Modifications: We reserve the right to modify, add, or remove features at any time without notice or refunds. We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your license at any time for violation of these Terms or illegal activity.

Service Availability: The App's functionality depends entirely on Rust+ application. If Rust+ application is removed from Google Play Store, stops functioning, or stops sending notifications, the App will not function regardless of your subscription or license status, and you will have NO RIGHT to refunds or compensation.

#### Refund Policy

ALL SALES ARE FINAL. NO REFUNDS WILL BE PROVIDED UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO:

- Rust+ application removal from Google Play Store, unavailability, or any issues
- Rust+ application stops sending notifications or notifications are delayed
- Rust+ application's notification features being removed, disabled, or modified by Facepunch Studios Limited
- Rust game server issues, outages, or problems
- App functionality issues (crashes, bugs, notification delays, alarm not triggering)
- App ceasing to function due to Rust+ application issues or removal
- User dissatisfaction with the App or its functionality
- User changed mind after purchase
- User's device not compatible with the App
- User denied required permissions
- Minor making unauthorized purchase (contact Google Play Store for refund requests)
- Any other reason whatsoever

After Google Play Store's refund window (typically 48 hours), NO REFUNDS will be provided by us under ANY circumstances, regardless of the reason.

BY PURCHASING A SUBSCRIPTION OR LICENSE, YOU EXPLICITLY WAIVE ALL RIGHTS TO REFUNDS, except for Google Play Store's standard refund window (typically 48 hours), after which NO REFUNDS will be provided.

#### Critical Acknowledgment

BY PURCHASING A SUBSCRIPTION OR LICENSE, YOU EXPLICITLY ACKNOWLEDGE, UNDERSTAND, AND IRREVOCABLY AGREE THAT: The App is completely dependent on Rust+ application (see Section 4). If Rust+ application is unavailable, removed, or stops functioning, the App will not function and you will have NO RIGHT to refunds or compensation. You accept ALL RISK associated with external dependencies and will NOT request refunds due to Rust+ issues, Rust game server issues, or any external dependency problems (except Google Play Store's standard 48-hour refund window).
terms_of_service.section9_title: 9. Intellectual Property and Trademark Fair Use
terms_of_service.section9_content:
Raid Alarm application and its content are protected by copyright and trademark laws. All rights belong to us.

Trademark Notice: "Rust+", "Rust", "Facepunch", and related logos, names, and trademarks are the exclusive property of Facepunch Studios Limited. We are NOT affiliated with, endorsed by, authorized by, or connected to Facepunch Studios Limited in any way. We use these trademarks ONLY for identification and descriptive purposes (nominative fair use under trademark law). We do NOT claim any rights to these trademarks. If Facepunch Studios Limited objects to our use, we will comply immediately. See Section 3 for additional information.
terms_of_service.section10_content:
THE APP IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, NON-INFRINGEMENT, OR THAT THE APP WILL FUNCTION CORRECTLY.

We do not warrant that the App will always function correctly, that third-party services will always be available, or that the App will operate continuously, uninterrupted, or error-free. The App's functionality depends entirely on Rust+ application (see Section 4). We make no representations or warranties regarding the App's functionality, availability, or reliability. YOU USE THE APP AT YOUR OWN RISK.
terms_of_service.section11_content:
TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, WE SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES, LOSSES, OR CONSEQUENCES RESULTING FROM:

- Rust+ application issues, removal from Google Play Store, unavailability, or any problems
- Rust+ application stopping to send notifications or notifications being delayed
- Rust+ application's notification features being removed, disabled, or modified by Facepunch Studios Limited
- Rust game server issues, outages, or problems
- Facepunch Studios Limited or related entities restricting, limiting, or prohibiting functionality
- App ceasing to function due to Rust+ application issues or removal
- Indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages
- Loss of profits, data, license value, or other intangible losses
- Any damages exceeding the amount you paid for the license
- Any damages whatsoever related to external dependencies or third-party services
- Minor making unauthorized purchase (parents/guardians are solely responsible)

IN NO EVENT SHALL OUR TOTAL LIABILITY EXCEED THE AMOUNT YOU PAID FOR THE LICENSE IN THE 12 MONTHS PRECEDING THE CLAIM.
terms_of_service.section12_content:
You are SOLELY RESPONSIBLE for:

- Installing and maintaining the Rust+ application on your device
- Ensuring Rust+ application is available, installed, and functioning properly
- Granting all necessary permissions to both Raid Alarm and Rust+ application
- Ensuring your device is compatible with both Raid Alarm and Rust+ application
- Understanding that the App COMPLETELY DEPENDS on Rust+ application and external services
- Understanding that if Rust+ application is removed from Google Play Store or stops functioning, the App will not function and you will have NO RIGHT to refunds
- Complying with Rust+ application Terms of Service and all applicable laws
- Ensuring your use does not violate Rust+ application Terms of Service
- Monitoring and authorizing purchases if you are a parent or guardian
- Ensuring you are at least 18 years old (or have parental/guardian consent) before purchasing

If your use violates Rust+ application Terms of Service, you are SOLELY RESPONSIBLE for any consequences, and we are NOT LIABLE for any resulting issues.
terms_of_service.section13_content: These Terms of Service may be updated from time to time. Significant changes will be notified to users. Your continued use of the App after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.
terms_of_service.section14_content: We may terminate or suspend your access to the App immediately, without prior notice, for violation of these Terms or at our sole discretion. We are not liable for any damages resulting from termination.
terms_of_service.section15_content: These Terms of Service are governed by applicable laws based on your location. Disputes will be resolved in accordance with applicable law and jurisdiction.
terms_of_service.section16_title: 16. Use of Community Tools and Open-Source Libraries
terms_of_service.section16_content:
Third-Party Libraries: This application utilizes publicly available, open-source community tools including rustplus.js (available at https://github.com/liamcottle/rustplus.js) and protocols similar to those used by established community services. These tools have been publicly available and widely used within the Rust community for several years.

Community Standards: We have implemented these tools in accordance with established community practices and standards. The protocols and methods we use are identical to those employed by long-standing community projects such as Discord bots that have operated for 5+ years without objection.

No Warranty for Third-Party Tools: While we use community-standard tools, we do not create, maintain, or control the underlying libraries. We make no warranties regarding the continued availability of these tools, the legal status of these tools, or the compliance of these tools with any terms of service.

Independent Responsibility: Our use of community tools does not transfer or assign responsibility to other community projects. We are independently responsible for our own application and its compliance with applicable terms and policies.

Right to Modify Implementation: If Facepunch Studios or other rights holders determine that our use of any community tools or protocols is inappropriate, we will immediately cease using the specified tools or protocols, modify our implementation as requested, or discontinue the application entirely if necessary. We do not claim that the existence of other community projects creates any legal right to operate this application.
